column6: EARTH'S MIGHTIEST HEROES MAKE BULLYING A THING OF THE PAST! - The Avengers have always stood up for those who cannot stand up for themselves, but this time they're in for a bombastic adventure of the highest order! - Featuring surprise guest stars from across the Marvel Universe including Spider-Man and The Guardians of the Galaxy! - Face front, readers! You won't want to miss this one!
